name: napcat-plugin-delta-force
description: 三角洲行动游戏数据查询插件 - 基于 NapCat 框架

scripts.copy: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('resources'))fs.cpSync('resources','dist/resources',{recursive:true});if(fs.existsSync('webui'))fs.cpSync('webui','dist/webui',{recursive:true});const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));delete pkg.devDependencies;delete pkg.scripts;pkg.main='index.mjs';fs.writeFileSync('dist/package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));console.log('✅ 已复制资源和webui到 dist 目录');"

author: 冷曦
